definition.de: Der Weg von und zur Arbeit, einschließlich Transportmöglichkeiten, Reisenetzwerke und Fahrgemeinschaften.
definition.dk: Regelmæssige ture mellem hjem og arbejdsplads, normalt dagligt.
definition.en-GB: The process of getting to and from work, including transport options, travel networks, car pooling.
definition.en-US: The process of getting to and from work, including transport options, travel networks, car pooling.
definition.pt-BR: O processo de chegar ao ou vir do trabalho, incluindo opções de transporte, redes de transporte e partilha de carro.
definition.pt-PT: O processo de chegar ao ou vir do trabalho, incluindo opções de transporte, redes de transporte e partilha de carro.
definition.se: Regelbundna resor mellan bostad och arbetsplats, vanligen dagliga.
definition.zh-Hans: 往返工作的过程，包括交通选择，行车线路，汽车共乘等
